name: [EXPLICIT] Squadra Magia Intergalattica
description:
Hello!

Alfonso De Luca here :)

This is my second project for the LocJAM, and my first solo run.

Truth be told, I didn't find enough time to translate everything, and I tried doing the whole thing in one day. I was SO wrong to think I could handle it - but hey, I hope you'll appreciate the effort and have a good laugh too! What I mean is that only half of the dialogues are completed. Most of the text follows the order of the file - the first sections of the game and UI should be almost fully localized. The remaining text was kept in English. Enjoy!

Disclaimer: as stated in the title, the Italian dialogues are readapted to contain (some) strong language.
